original_text:
The murderer rises before it is light,
    that he may kill the poor and needy,
    and in the night he is like a thief.
korean_text: 사람을 죽이는 자는 밝을 때에 일어나서 학대 받는 자나 가난한 자를 죽이고 밤에는 도둑 같이 되며

sentences.original_text: The murderer rises before it is light
that he may kill the poor and needy
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 죽이려 합니다

sentences.original_text: and in the night he is like a thief
